title: Media Call: Can Ukraine Sustain Advances in Its Existential Fight?
descriptions: RAND researchers will discuss the latest news about the conflict in Ukraine.

sub_content.What: A moderated conversation with RAND experts, followed by journalist Q&A

sub_content.When: Monday, September 19, 2:00 p.m. to 2:45 p.m. ET

sub_content.Who: Alyssa Demus, Samuel Charap, and Barry Pavel, moderated by Jeffrey Hiday.

sub_content.RSVP: Contact media@rand.org to request a ZoomGov link to this conversation. Please write UKRAINE LINK in the subject line.

sub_content.Interviews:
To arrange an interview, contact the RAND Office of Media Relations:
(703) 414-4795 or
(310) 451-6913, or
send an email to media@rand.org.

content.Article: RAND researchers will discuss the latest news about the conflict in Ukraine, including:
